text: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion is a 2001 American German crime comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and also starring Helen Hunt, Dan Aykroyd, Wallace Shawn, Elizabeth Berkley, Charlize Theron, David Ogden Stiers, Brian Markinson. It was distributed by DreamWorks Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2001 comedy movies Category:2001 crime movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies about hypnosis Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies
title: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
